original_text: They did the same bad things that the nations that lived in Canaan did. The Lord had chased those nations out of Canaan so that the Israelites could live there. The Israelites copied the bad things that the kings of Israel were doing.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 이방 사람의 규례와 이스라엘 여러 왕이 세운 율례를 행하였음이라

sentences.original_text: They did the same bad things
that the nations that lived in Canaan did
sentences.korean_translation: 가나안에 살았던 민족들이 하던 것과 같은

sentences.original_text: The Lord had chased those nations out of Canaan
so that the Israelites could live there
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이스라엘 사람들이 그곳에 살 수 있게 하려고

sentences.original_text: The Israelites copied the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 나쁜 일들을 따라 했습니다

sentences.original_text: that the kings of Israel were doing
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 왕들이 하고 있던 것과 같은
